title: Document a Property Incident
description: A tenant reports they slipped and fell in a common area. The agent must create a formal incident report.

tasks.description: Gather all information about the incident from the tenant: date, time, location, circumstances, and any injuries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects a detailed account of the event.

tasks.description: Fill out the company's standard incident report form with the collected information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete and accurate incident report.

tasks.description: Notify the property owner and the company's insurance carrier of the incident, providing them with a copy of the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows protocol by notifying all relevant parties.
